_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!loggedInUser: loggedInUser(),
  local!triggerRefresh: a!refreshVariable(
    value: now(),
    refreshAfter: "RECORD_ACTION"
  ),
  local!pagingInfo: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_pagingInfo"(
    startIndex: 1,
    batchSize: cons!AS_GSS_BATCH_SIZE_FOR_EVALUATIONS_IN_HOME_PAGE
  ),
  local!i18nData: rule!AS_GSS_CO_UT_loadBundleFromFolder(langISOCode: null),
  local!isEvaluator: rule!AS_GSS_BL_determineIfUserIsEvaluator(loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser),
  local!evaluations: rule!AS_GSS_BL_returnEvaluationInfoForLandingPage(
    loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser,
    executeWhen: true(),
    pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
    triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
  ),
  local!selectedTasks: a!refreshVariable(
    value: null,
    refreshOnVarChange: { local!triggerRefresh }
  ),
  local!canUserCreateEvalaution: rule!AS_GSS_BL_getVisibilityToCreateEvaluation(user: local!loggedInUser),
  local!isHomePage: true(),
  rule!AS_GSS_HCL_evaluationsLandingPage(
    header: rule!AS_GSS_CPS_landingPageHeader(
      i18nData: local!i18nData,
      showCreateEvaluationAction: and(
        local!canUserCreateEvalaution,
        a!isNotNullOrEmpty(value: local!evaluations.data)
      )
    ),
    contents: {
      /*My Active Evaluations*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_activeEvaluations(
        evaluations: local!evaluations,
        isEvaluator: local!isEvaluator,
        pagingInfo: local!pagingInfo,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        loggedInUser: local!loggedInUser,
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh,
        showCreateEvaluationAction: local!canUserCreateEvalaution
      ),
      /*My Tasks*/
      rule!AS_GSS_CPS_activeTasks(
        selectedTasks: local!selectedTasks,
        user: local!loggedInUser,
        i18nData: local!i18nData,
        isEvaluator: local!isEvaluator,
        isHomePage: local!isHomePage,
        showWhen: true(),
        triggerRefresh: local!triggerRefresh
      )
    }
  )
)

_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_CPS_richTextWithShowMoreLess
_a-0000eb4d-def5-8000-9d18-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  local!shortenIfLongerThanLen: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
    default: ri!shortenToLen
  ),
  local!showLess: true,
  #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextDisplayField"(
    label: a!defaultValue(ri!label, null),
    labelPosition: a!defaultValue(ri!labelPosition, "COLLAPSED"),
    instructions: ri!instructions,
    helpTooltip: ri!helpToolTip,
    value: a!match(
      value: ri!text,
      whenTrue: and(
        a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
        ri!showHyphen = true
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "-", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: a!isNullorEmpty(fv!value),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: "", color: "STANDARD"),
      whenTrue: or(
        a!isNullorEmpty(ri!shortenToLen),
        ri!shortenToLen = 0
      ),
      then: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(text: fv!value, color: "STANDARD"),
      default: if(
        len(ri!text) <= local!shortenIfLongerThanLen,
        #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
          text: ri!text,
          color: "STANDARD",
          size: ri!textSize
        ),
        if(
          local!showLess = true,
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: trim(
                rule!AS_CO_UT_left(text: ri!text, numChars: ri!shortenToLen)
              ) & "... ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "More",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show More",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, false)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          },
          {
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              text: ri!text & " ",
              color: ri!textColor,
              size: ri!textSize
            ),
            #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_richTextItem_v1"(
              color: ri!linkColor,
              text: "Less",
              link: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_dynamicLink"(
                label: if(
                  cons!AS_GSS_TOGGLE_AUTOMATION_TESTING_ENABLED,
                  "Show Less",
                  null
                ),
                saveInto: a!save(local!showLess, true)
              ),
              style: "STRONG",
              size: ri!textSize
            )
          }
        )
      )
    ),
    preventWrapping: ri!preventWrapping,
    tooltip: ri!tooltip,
    showWhen: ri!showWhen,
    align: ri!align,
    marginAbove: ri!marginAbove,
    marginBelow: a!defaultValue(ri!marginBelow, "NONE"),
  )
)

_a-0000ecb5-bbc6-8000-9dba-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_mapEvaluationDataForDeletion
_a-0000ecb5-bbc6-8000-9dba-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
a!localVariables(
  /* Retrieve Evaluation Related Data*/
  local!evaluationPhases: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationPhase],
  local!evaluationTeams: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.team],
  local!evaluationVendors: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationVendors(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
      ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
    ),
    evaluationId: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
    fields: {
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.vendorRefId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.externalVendorId
    }
  ),
  local!evaluationCriterias: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getCriteria(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
      ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
    ),
    evaluationId: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
    fields: {
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaStatusId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime
    }
  ),
  local!evaluationConsensusReports: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getConsensusReport(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
      ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
    ),
    evaluationId: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
    fields: {
      recordType!AS_GSS_ConsensusReport_SYNCEDRECORD.consensusId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_ConsensusReport_SYNCEDRECORD.statusId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_ConsensusReport_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      recordType!AS_GSS_ConsensusReport_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      recordType!AS_GSS_ConsensusReport_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive
    }
  ),
  local!evaluationDocuments: rule!AS_GSS_QR_getEvaluationDocuments(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
      ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
    ),
    evaluationId: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
    sourceApplicationId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_SOURCE_APPLICATION_GSS,
    isDeleted: false(),
    fields: {
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDocumentId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime,
      recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted,
      
    }
  ),
  local!evaluationTasks: rule!AS_GSS_TMG_QR_getTasks(
    returnType: cons!AS_CO_ENUM_QE_RETURN_TYPE_OBJECT_ARRAY,
    executeWhen: a!isNotNullOrEmpty(
      ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId]
    ),
    evaluationId: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
    taskStatusId: {
      cons!AS_GSS_TMG_REF_ID_TASK_STATUS_QUEUED,
      cons!AS_GSS_TMG_REF_ID_TASK_STATUS_ASSIGNED,
      cons!AS_GSS_TMG_REF_ID_TASK_STATUS_IN_PROGRESS
    },
    fields: {
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskStatusId,
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy,
      recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime
    }
  ),
  /* Mark Related Data As Inactive And Change Status*/
  local!updatedEvaluationPhases: a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!evaluationPhases,
      expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
        records: fv!item,
        modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD(
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: false(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy: loggedInUser(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationPhase_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime: now()
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!updatedEvaluationVendors: a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!evaluationVendors,
      expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
        records: fv!item,
        modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD(
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: false(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy: loggedInUser(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationVendor_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime: now()
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!updatedEvaluationTeams: a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!evaluationTeams,
      expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
        records: fv!item,
        modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD(
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: false(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy: loggedInUser(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluatorTeam_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime: now()
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!updatedEvaluationCriterias: a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!evaluationCriterias,
      expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
        records: fv!item,
        modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD(
          recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.criteriaStatusId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_DELETED,
          recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: false(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy: loggedInUser(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_Criteria_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime: now()
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!updatedEvaluationConsensusReports: a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!evaluationConsensusReports,
      expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
        records: fv!item,
        modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_ConsensusReport_SYNCEDRECORD(
          recordType!AS_GSS_ConsensusReport_SYNCEDRECORD.statusId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_CONSENSUS_REPORT_STATUS_DELETED,
          recordType!AS_GSS_ConsensusReport_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: false(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_ConsensusReport_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy: loggedInUser(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_ConsensusReport_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime: now()
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!updatedEvaluationDocuments: a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!evaluationDocuments,
      expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
        records: fv!item,
        modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD(
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted: true(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy: loggedInUser(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime: now(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletedDocument: recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD(
            recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.evalDocumentId: fv!item[recordType!AS_GSS_EvaluationDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDocumentId],
            recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.deletionDate: today() + cons!AS_GSS_INT_DOCUMENT_DELETION_BUFFER_DAYS,
            recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.isDeleted: false(),
            recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdBy: loggedInUser(),
            recordType!AS_GSS_DeletedDocument_SYNCEDRECORD.createdDatetime: now()
          )
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  local!updatedEvaluationTasks: a!flatten(
    #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
      items: local!evaluationTasks,
      expression: rule!AS_GSS_UT_updateRecordsByModelRecord(
        records: fv!item,
        modelRecord: recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD(
          recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.taskStatusId: cons!AS_GSS_TMG_REF_ID_TASK_STATUS_DELETED,
          recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy: loggedInUser(),
          recordType!AS_GSS_TMG_Task_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime: now()
        )
      )
    )
  ),
  /* Construct Deactivated Evaluation Record To Be Written*/
  recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD(
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationId],
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationNumber],
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationStatusId: cons!AS_GSS_REF_ID_EVALUATION_STATUS_DELETED,
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.deletionReason: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.deletionReason],
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.isActive: false(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedBy: loggedInUser(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.modifiedDatetime: now(),
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId: ri!evaluationRecord[recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.sourceApplicationId],
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationPhase: local!updatedEvaluationPhases,
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.vendor: local!updatedEvaluationVendors,
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.criteria: local!updatedEvaluationCriterias,
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.team: local!updatedEvaluationTeams,
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.consensusReport: local!updatedEvaluationConsensusReports,
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.evaluationDocuments: local!updatedEvaluationDocuments,
    recordType!AS_GSS_Evaluation_SYNCEDRECORD.task: local!updatedEvaluationTasks
  )
)

_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_queryRecordByIdentifier
_a-0000ec62-ac34-8000-9d9a-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*

PLEASE REFER TO THE BOTTOM OF THIS RULE FOR INSTRUCTIONS ON HOW TO USE

Please DO NOT auto-format this rule

*/
a!localVariables(
  /*Determine the castResultToType*/
  local!castResultToType: a!defaultValue(ri!castToCdtType, ri!recordType),
  /*Execute the query*/
  local!queryResult: a!refreshVariable(
    value: if(
      ri!executeWhen = false,
      null(ri!recordType),
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryRecordByIdentifier"(
        recordType: ri!recordType,
        identifier: ri!identifier,
        fields: {
          ri!fields,
          ri!relatedRecordData.relationship
        },
        relatedRecordData: ri!relatedRecordData
      )
    ),
    refreshOnVarChange: ri!triggerRefresh,
    refreshAfter: { "RECORD_ACTION" }
  ),
  rule!AS_CO_UT_cast(
    type: local!castResultToType,
    value: local!queryResult
  )
)/*

DOCUMENTATION

This rule is designed to minimize the overhead with querying data and then casting the result


Required Inputs:

1. recordType
- This is a recordtype! input of the data type to be queried against

2. identifier
- The primary key of the record type which needs to be queried

Optional Inputs:

3. executeWhen
- The query will not execute if this is false, the query will execute if this is true or null
-- This is meant to operate in a similar manner to the showWhen parameter of components
- Use this to skip execution of a query without needing to wrap if() statements around the rule
-- Examples of this would be to skip querying if your filter value is a null ID
- If the query does not execute, this will return a null value whose type is based on the returnType input

4. triggerRefresh
- By default, the query will always re-execute whenever any inputs change
- However, by updating the value of triggerRefresh, you can also trigger a re-execution even if none of the other inputs change (e.g. after a record action)

5. castToCdtType
- Any cdt type to the cast the result set. 

6. fields
- The record fields that need to be queried

7. relatedRecordData
- the relatedRecordData in which the filters and limit can be specified for each relationship

*/

_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_determineAuditActionCode
_a-0000e3e6-fb42-8000-9ba5-011c48011c48_.sail_code:

  where(
    {
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isNotBlank(ri!externalAction),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!originalObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(index(ri!newObject, ri!auditConfig.idField, null)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", 1)) = toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", 1)),
      toboolean(index(ri!originalObject, "isActive", false)),
      toboolean(index(ri!newObject, "isActive", true))
    }
  )[1],
  ri!externalAction,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_ADD,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DELETE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_MODIFY,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_DEACTIVATE,
  cons!AS_ADT_ENUM_AUDIT_ACTION_CODE_REACTIVATE
)

            field: "evaluation.evaluationId",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!evaluationId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskId",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!taskId
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskStatus.taskStatusId",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!taskStatusIds
          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskRefId",
            operator: "in",

          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "taskCategory.categoryName",
            operator: "in",

          ),
          #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_queryFilter"(
            field: "userAssignee",
            operator: "in",
            value: ri!userAssignee
          ),
          ri!additionalFilters
        }
      ),
      ri!additionalLogicalExpressions
    },
    
  ),
  pagingInfo: ri!pagingInfo,
  executeWhen: ri!executeWhen,
  entityType: 'type!{urn:com:appian:types:AS:GSS:TMG}AS_GSS_TMG_Task',
  returnType: ri!returnType,

        }
      )
    ),

)

_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_checkIfTotalWeightEqualsUpperLimit
_a-0000eb72-c933-8000-9d28-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
Note: 
If total parent factor weight reaches anywhere between 
99.95 and 100, we round off the total parent factor weight 
to 100.

If total subfactor weight reaches anywhere between (x-1).95 and x,
where "X" is the parent factor weight, we round off the total 
subfactor weight to x. 
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!upperLimit: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!parentFactorWeight,
    default: cons!AS_GSS_DEC_FACTOR_WEIGHT_TOTAL_POINTS
  ),
  and(
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) >= 0,
    (local!upperLimit - ri!totalWeight) <= 0.05
  )
)

_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.name: AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit
_a-0000e5da-a251-8000-9bbe-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
rule!AS_CO_UT_captureMetadataIfUpdated(
  originalCdt: ri!oldObject,
  updatedCdt: if(
    rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(touniformstring(index(ri!auditConfig.complexFields, "fieldName", null))),
    ri!newObject,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_updateCdtFieldsByFieldValuePairs(
      cdt: ri!newObject,
      fieldValuePairs: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        items: ri!auditConfig.complexFields,
        expression: a!localVariables(
          local!complexFieldAuditConfig: fv!item,
          {
            field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName,
            value: #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
              items: ri!newObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
              expression: rule!AS_ADT_UT_captureMetadataDuringAudit(
                newObject: fv!item,
                oldObject: if(
                  isnull(ri!oldObject),
                  null,
                  index(
                    rule!AS_CO_UT_filterCdtByField(
                      cdt: ri!oldObject[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.fieldName],
                      field: local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField,
                      value: fv!item[local!complexFieldAuditConfig.idField]
                    ),
                    1,
                    null
                  )
                ),
                auditConfig: local!complexFieldAuditConfig,
                modifiedBy: ri!modifiedBy
              )
            )
          }
        )
      )
    )
  ),

cast(
  'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Text',
  with(
    local!bundleKeyParse: rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_parseBundleKey(bundleKey: ri!bundleKey),
    local!label: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName),
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey],
      ri!i18nData[local!bundleKeyParse.bundleName][local!bundleKeyParse.labelKey]
    ),
    local!updatedLabel: rule!AS_CO_UT_replaceNull(
      nullableValue: local!label,
      replacementValue: ri!bundleKey
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments: if(
      rule!AS_CO_UT_isBlank(ri!arguments),
      local!updatedLabel,
      reduce(
        rule!AS_CO_I18N_UT_replaceArgument(input: _, index: _, arguments: ri!arguments),
        local!updatedLabel,
        enumerate(count(ri!arguments)) + 1
      )
    ),
    local!updatedLabelForArguments
  )
)

_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.name: AS_GSS_UT_isBlank
_a-0000eb69-8eb8-8000-9d24-011c48011c48_.sail_code:
/*
This rule null checks below scenarios, 

-- null value
-- an empty list
-- an empty string
-- list of null values
-- all fields of the CDT are null
      While passing a CDT, make sure ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull is TRUE to handle
    this scenario
-- string with only spaces
*/
a!localVariables(
  local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull: a!defaultValue(
    value: ri!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull, 
    default: false
  ),
  local!keys: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    a!keys(value: index(ri!value, 1, null)),
    null
  ),
  local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    rule!AS_CO_UT_rejectNullValuesFromArray(
      #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
        rule!AS_CO_UT_castToMapList(ri!value),
        a!localVariables(
          local!currentItem: fv!item,
          local!currentIndex: fv!index,
          if(
            length(
              a!flatten(
                #"SYSTEM_SYSRULES_forEach"(
                  local!keys,
                  rule!AS_CO_UT_whereContains(
                    values: null,
                    array: rule!AS_CO_UT_indexPath(
                      cdt: a!flatten(local!currentItem),
                      field: fv!item
                    )
                  )
                )
              )
            ) = length(local!keys),
            local!currentIndex,
            null
          )
        )
      )
    ),
    null
  ),
  local!filteredCdt: if(
    local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
    remove(
      a!flatten(ri!value),
      local!indicesOfCdtsWhereAllFieldsAreNull
    ),
    null
  ),
  cast(
    'type!{http://www.appian.com/ae/types/2009}Boolean',
    or(
      length(a!flatten(ri!value)) = 0,
      a!isNullOrEmpty(
        if(
          local!checkIfAllCdtFieldsAreNull,
          local!filteredCdt,
          trim(ri!value)
        )
      )
    )
  )
)
